/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. Cars and pedestrians add a dynamic element to the scene, illustrating the city's vibrant energy. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a serene backdrop to the bustling activity below.
